price: (Nkͻmhyεni), sε wᴐbu wo nkontomponi a, saa ara na wᴐbuu asomafoͻ a wͻdii w’anim kan no nkontompofoͻ. Onyankopͻn hͻ na dwumadie nyinaa san kͻ.
arabic: وَإِن يُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَدۡ كُذِّبَتۡ رُسُلٞ مِّن قَبۡلِكَۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ ٱلۡأُمُورُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-in yukadhibūka faqad kudhibat rusulun min qablika wa-ilā al-lahi tur'jaʿu al-umūru
